WonderkidAnswered on 07 Jun 2019Just broke its previous 52week high so, be careful if you wanna get into this REIT now.My recommendation would be to wait it out, maybe for a correction of sorts, then get in.The REIT is not a must buy but, it doesn't mean it 's a bad REIT, so it all comes down to if you like the business model of the REIT.Personally I bought it at its 52week high previously and I'm pretty relieved that it's at 1.26 now!!0 comments1
